rankings.naacNote: First cycle A+, youngest university to achieve A+ in first cycle

highlights: 200+ acre smart campus in Mohali, Punjab
NAAC A+ accreditation (Score: 3.28/4 - Youngest university to achieve A+ in first cycle)
NIRF 2025 Rank: 32nd Overall, 20th in Universities Category
Industry partnerships with Google, Microsoft, Amazon
Top rankings: Engineering (32nd), Management (36th), Pharmacy (20th), Architecture (13th)

campus.description: One of the largest private university campuses in North India with modern architecture and green spaces
